Text:
Since there's no comment on them, I thought i'd take the time.

Jim Dale is a fascinating narrator. I have listened to these audiobooks twice in the course of 3 months. They're absolutely perfect if you have to do menial tasks and need to let your brain escape. The characters are lively and Jim Dale doesn't have one voice, but literally hundreds. 

The quality on these are perfect, and rosie1966 is well deserving of that pink skull.

I have found that, this series is a joy to listen to while I work on math homework, or cleaning, etc. where my attentions are diverted between things, because Ive listened to it so much its alright if I miss a bit here and there.

Thanks for the up
Hubba Hubba
So who is the better narrator? The comments at the Steven Fry torrent suggest he's got a nice voice whereas Jim Dale torrents comments suggest he's better then Steven Fry.. I am getting confused.
